strategy.limit_locked_hint: Forced to Limit when 'Sell Above Buy' is enabled
strategy.limit_required: Limit required for sell above buy

order_config.limit_required: Limit required for sell above buy

tooltips.order_type: Market orders execute immediately at best available price. Limit orders are placed on the orderbook and wait for a match at your specified price.
tooltips.price_mode: The reference price used to calculate your order price. Mid = average of best bid/ask. Best Bid/Ask = top of orderbook. Market = last traded price.
tooltips.side: Buy: Only place buy orders. Sell: Only place sell orders. Both: Place both buy and sell orders each cycle.
tooltips.price_offset: Percentage offset from reference price. For buys, adds to price (buy higher). For sells, subtracts from price (sell lower). 0% = exact reference price.
tooltips.max_spread: Maximum bid-ask spread allowed. If spread exceeds this, no orders are placed. Prevents trading in illiquid markets.
tooltips.max_open_orders: Maximum open orders per side. E.g., 2 means max 2 buy orders + 2 sell orders at once. Prevents over-exposure.
tooltips.size_mode: % Balance: Use percentage of available balance. Fixed USD: Use fixed dollar amount per order.
tooltips.base_balance_percent: Percentage of base asset balance to use for sell orders. 100% = use entire available balance.
tooltips.quote_balance_percent: Percentage of quote asset balance to use for buy orders. 100% = use entire available balance.
tooltips.fixed_usd_amount: Fixed USD value for each order. Applied to both buy and sell orders.
tooltips.min_order_size: Minimum order value in USD. Orders below this are skipped. Prevents dust orders.
tooltips.max_order_size: Maximum order value in USD. Caps order size even if balance allows more. Leave empty for no limit.
tooltips.cycle_interval: Time between order placement cycles (in milliseconds). Random interval between min and max adds unpredictability.
tooltips.sell_above_buy: When enabled, only places sell orders above your last buy price + take profit %. Prevents selling at a loss.
tooltips.take_profit: Minimum profit margin above buy price required for sell orders. 0.02% covers round-trip fees (0.01% buy + 0.01% sell).
tooltips.stop_loss: Emergency exit if price drops below your average buy price by this percentage. Cancels all orders and market sells entire position.
tooltips.order_timeout: Cancel unfilled orders after this many minutes. Useful for limit orders that don't get filled.
tooltips.max_session_loss: Pause trading for the session if realized losses exceed this USD amount. End session to reset.

console.title: Trade Execution Console
console.trading_inactive: Trading inactive. Click "Start Trading" to begin.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: By using this trading bot, you agree to the following terms:
terms.responsibility: You are responsible for all trading activities
terms.risks: You understand the risks involved in automated trading
terms.legal: You will not use this bot for illegal activities
terms.loss_risk: You acknowledge that trading involves risk of loss
terms.bugs: You acknowledge this bot likely has bugs
terms.experimental: You acknowledge this is highly experimental software
terms.full_terms: Please read the full terms of use at
terms.checkbox_label: I have read and agree to the Terms of Use
terms.accept_to_continue: Please accept the terms of use to continue

welcome.title: o2 Trading Bot
welcome.welcome_subtitle: Your automated trading companion for the o2 exchange
welcome.warning_alpha: This is an experimental alpha release. Only trade with funds you can afford to lose
welcome.dashboard_organized: The dashboard is organized into panels for controls, monitoring, balances, and strategy management.
welcome.trading_controls_desc: Start, stop, or resume your automated trading session
welcome.trade_console_desc: Live feed of all trading activity with P&L tracking
welcome.available_markets_desc: Browse and select markets to trade
welcome.balances_panel_desc: View your available and locked funds
welcome.strategy_config_desc: Create and manage your trading strategies
welcome.strategy_subtitle: How to set up your trading strategy
welcome.market_callout: Select which trading pair to use for this strategy
welcome.order_type_callout: Market for instant execution, Spot for limit orders
welcome.side_callout: Buy only, Sell only, or Both directions
welcome.position_sizing_callout: Use % of balance or fixed USD amounts per trade
welcome.risk_management_callout: Take profit, stop loss, and daily loss limits
welcome.market_price_callout: Current market and live price from the exchange
welcome.pnl_tracking_callout: Realized profit/loss and fees for the session
welcome.trade_count_callout: Number of executed trades in current session
welcome.console_tip: The console shows color-coded messages - green for successful trades, blue for pending orders, red for errors.
welcome.step1_desc: Review available funds in the Balances panel. Deposit on o2.app if needed.
welcome.step2_desc: Click the button below and configure your trading parameters.
welcome.step3_desc: Set stop loss, take profit, and position limits based on your risk tolerance.
welcome.step4_desc: Toggle your strategy to Active status.
welcome.step5_desc: Click the Start button and watch your strategy execute.
welcome.tip_start_small: Start with small position sizes while learning how the bot behaves with your strategy configuration.

tutorials.title: Tutorials
tutorials.subtitle: Learn how to use the o2 Trading Bot effectively
tutorials.step1_desc: Click "Connect Wallet" and select your preferred wallet
tutorials.step2_desc: Make sure you have funds deposited on o2.app
tutorials.step3_desc: Use Strategy Configuration to create new or import existing strategies
tutorials.step4_desc: Select from available markets in your strategy settings
tutorials.step5_title: Choose a preset or go custom
tutorials.step5_desc: Simple, Volume Max, Profit-Taking presets available, or customize all variables
tutorials.step6_desc: Hit Save, then click Start Trading to begin
tutorials.quick_start_note: Once live, you can pause, resume, or launch new sessions anytime.
tutorials.experimental_warning: Note: This app is highly experimental. Trade responsibly.

invitation.title: Enter Invitation Code
invitation.description: If you have an invitation code, enter it below to gain access to trading.

sign_message.title: Verify Wallet Ownership
sign_message.description: Sign this message to securely connect your wallet and create a trading session.
sign_message.note: This is not a blockchain transaction, does not cost any gas, and does not grant permission to move funds from your wallet.

access_queue.not_eligible: You are not currently eligible to trade. Please wait for approval or use an invitation code.
access_queue.not_eligible_message: You are not currently eligible to trade. Please wait for approval or use an invitation code.
access_queue.info_saved: Contact information saved. You will be notified when your turn comes.
access_queue.contact_saved: Contact information saved. You will be notified when your turn comes.
